Text.text: Just one last push and my magical mushroom master plan will be realised! How does it feel to be a loser, Andreaea?
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: It's not over 'til it's over, you pompous toad. I won't give up until I've turned every last inch of your rotten mushroom patch into risotto.
Text.speaker: ANDREAEA

Text.text: Oh, go boil your head in the bog, you bitter bolete. I'll be the talk of the Guild, and you'll be a withered old witch.
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: Delightful as it is to watch you crash and burn, I've got the Lichen sisters coming round for tea in a minute. Ta-ta, Agaricus! I look forward to turning your murky lair into a beautiful moss garden.
Text.speaker: ANDREAEA
